name: Swallowed by the Subway
description:
You're miserable in New York City, and after a horrible night of meeting people who will never actually want to be friends with you, you wake up trapped in the subway tunnels. When a mysterious rat offers to help get you out, will you accept the terms of their agreement?

Swallowed by the Subway is a text based adventure game. 

Written and created by Isabelle Smith 

Posters and Art by Erin Gray 

Here is the link to a curated playlist you can listen to while playing the game: 

https://open.spotify.com/playlist/3YsW4b9XzPnl7TaDHia29l?si=4355e9ed7e1f4c72

And here is link to check out all the art used in the game: 

https://www.pinterest.com/isabellesmith75/swallowed-by-the-subway/

Special Thanks to Mason Smith, Sarah Schecter, Tommy Gray, Jacob Menke, Ryan Stevens, Lillian Mottern, Sara Bellusci, Andrew Tye,  Stella Delgado, Robin Smith, Bridey Caramagno, Corven Sena, and Erin Gray
